languages.text: {n}Насупившись, простолюдин кланяется и бормочет под нос:{/n} "Ой, зря. За пехотки таких гостей надо, да на костер".

{n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."
languages.original_text: {n}Насупившись, простолюдин кланяется и бормочет под нос:{/n} "Ой, зря. За пехотки таких гостей надо, да на костер".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a sulking grimace, the old man bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like those, better grab 'em by the floppers and burn right quick."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人皱着眉头鞠了一躬，小声嘟囔起来。{/n}“哎哟，这可不会有好果子吃。碰到这样的客人，最好赶紧把他们抓起来，扔到火堆里烧了。赶紧烧死就对了。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人皱着眉头鞠了一躬，小声嘟囔起来。{/n}“哎哟，这可不会有好果子吃。碰到这样的客人，最好赶紧把他们抓起来，扔到火堆里烧了。赶紧烧死就对了。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}眉をひそめ苦笑いをした一般市民は、頭を下げ、ブツブツと呟いた。{/n}「こりゃあ、まずい。こんな客人、早くつかんで火刑台に連れてった方がいい。早く燃やすんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.locale_text: {n}眉をひそめ苦笑いをした一般市民は、頭を下げ、ブツブツと呟いた。{/n}「こりゃあ、まずい。こんな客人、早くつかんで火刑台に連れてった方がいい。早く燃やすんだ」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}El plebeyo frunce el ceño y murmura en voz baja:{/n} «Esto no acabará bien. A los visitantes como este hay que agarrarlos por las orejas y llevarlos a la hoguera. Cuanto antes ardan, mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.locale_text: {n}El plebeyo frunce el ceño y murmura en voz baja:{/n} «Esto no acabará bien. A los visitantes como este hay que agarrarlos por las orejas y llevarlos a la hoguera. Cuanto antes ardan, mejor».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Mit gerunzelter Stirn krümmt sich der Mann aus dem Pöbel zusammen und murmelt:{/n} "Oh, das nimmt kein gutes Ende. Solche Gäste muss man am Gebaumel packen und zum Scheiterhaufen zerren. Nicht lang fackeln, gleich abfackeln."
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit gerunzelter Stirn krümmt sich der Mann aus dem Pöbel zusammen und murmelt:{/n} "Oh, das nimmt kein gutes Ende. Solche Gäste muss man am Gebaumel packen und zum Scheiterhaufen zerren. Nicht lang fackeln, gleich abfackeln."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme s'incline en fronçant les sourcils, mais ne peut s'empêcher de marmonner :{/n} « Oh, ça va mal finir, cette histoire. Les invités de ce genre, vaut mieux les prendre par la peau des fesses et les balancer direct sur le bûcher. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme s'incline en fronçant les sourcils, mais ne peut s'empêcher de marmonner :{/n} « Oh, ça va mal finir, cette histoire. Les invités de ce genre, vaut mieux les prendre par la peau des fesses et les balancer direct sur le bûcher. »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü ekşiten avam, başını eğip kendi kendine mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Sonumuz hayrolsun. Misafirin böylesini tuttuğun gibi ateşe atacaksın. Kül olsun gitsin."
languages.original_text: {n}With a frowning grimace, the commoner bows and mutters under his breath,{/n} "Oh, this won't end well. With guests like these, better grab 'em by the floppers and to the pyre. Burn them right quick."

traits.speaker: OldMan
